title: Pls fix your game!
body: Someone has probably said this but can you guys please put in a system that prevents a loss if a person on your team is lvl 1 throughout a 30 minute game. So many afk's ruin games, i know you dont want to ban your player base out but please so something about this shit. Some sort of compensation would be nice.!!!

replies.body: People could make a smurf and play normal games with it 2 get an instant win. That's why this wouldn't work.

It's a loss prevented. No one loses or wins on the record books.

This idea, however, doesn't cover for players that play for a bit then ragequit. 
I'm pretty sure those that deliberately ragequit in the middle of a match are the ones that must be punished not the player that suddenly loses their internet connection and couldn't connect to the match. 
Though both players must be warned and punished to stop them from playing, this idea doesn't cover most of the offending playerbase only a small part of it.
That idea is stupid. People could easily find ways to abuse the system.
Pls tell me how people can abuse it?
